description: Quantum networks can sometimes be prefixed with 'br-' in the case of using the trunk Quantum nvp plugin for a bridged network. The uuid-like check on line 526 of servers.py in the osapi prevents passing requesting networks that have the prefixes on them.
title: Requested Networks UUID-like check prevents some quantum networks

comments.content: Quantum networks can sometimes be prefixed with 'br-' in the case of using the trunk Quantum nvp plugin for a bridged network. The uuid-like check on line 526 of servers.py in the osapi prevents passing requesting networks that have the prefixes on them.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jason-koelker

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/9381

commit dd0e0ad5942743a434adf36bb91d107ac4e484e9
Author: Jason Kölker <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jul 5 11:21:13 2012 -0500

    Allow network_uuids that begin with a prefix
    
    * If the bare network_uuid is not uuid-like, attempt to validate
      with the first 'prefix-' stripped off
    * Fix LP1021370
    
    Change-Id: I4914d4ffcb633aef1c5b7f8abfa0b48eaf4f0cc9
